name: Procedurally Generated Golf
description:
Disclaimer: this game is awful

I made this for my computer science A-Level coursework and I can't lie it's mid...

Play golf on procedurally generated islands, in two exciting modes:

Endless (Singleplayer)

Multiplayer (Local)

There's probably bugs everywhere and it was written in a language known as "spaghetti code", made using the Unity engine.
